People's Daily People's Daily full text RSS. Get more full text RSS: https://feedx.net http://www.people.com.cn/ 01版要闻 - 坚守岗位作贡献 奋斗实干建新功http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/05/nw.D110000renmrb_20231005_1-01.htm
;Thursday, October 5, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

; During the National Day holiday, workers stick to their posts and fight on the front line . The photos from top to bottom are:
; Workers are constructing the bridge at the construction site of the Tiyu Street Interchange in Shijiazhuang City, Hebei Province.
;Photo by Zhang Xiaofeng (published by Xinhua News Agency)
;Technicians from the Beijing Urban Lighting Management Center are repairing street lights.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Li Xin
;In Zhengyang Industrial Park, Qianjiang District, Chongqing, employees of a silk company work in the workshop.
;Photo by Yang Min (People's Vision)
;Fire rescue personnel inspect safety equipment in Anshun Economic and Technological Development Zone, Guizhou.
;Photo by Chen Xi (published by Xinhua News Agency)

;
; ;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized: "Strengthen the country The grand goal of construction and national rejuvenation is inspiring and inspiring. We must seize the day, strengthen historical confidence, enhance historical initiative, persist in integrity and innovation, maintain strategic focus, carry forward the spirit of struggle, be brave in overcoming difficulties, and continue to strengthen the country. Contribute to the great cause of construction and national rejuvenation!”

;

;During the National Day holiday, from urban communities to vast villages, from production front lines to tourist attractions, many people stick to their posts, contribute silently, and spend the holiday in hard work , build new achievements through hard work and hard work.

;

;;Fighting on the front line  Step up construction;

;

;In the past few days, workers have continued to fight on the front line, racing against time to ensure the progress of construction and production.

;

;Heilongjiang Harbin Electric Group Boiler Company Chongzong Branch Factory, the welding group welders came to the workshop early to preheat, debug, and perform welding. Welding spatter was everywhere in the workshop. Team leader Cheng Qiang, his forehead covered with beads of sweat, got into the large cylinder component, leaving shiny welds on the inner wall of the component. “This is a process gasifier with sensible heat recovery and semi-waste boiler, which has the characteristics of energy saving and high carbon conversion rate.” Cheng Qiang said, “Stick to the post during the holidays and deliver each product with high quality and on time. We are working hard! ”

;

;The crystal clear particles flipped and jumped, and the conveyor belt automatically sealed the packets... At the Lianyungang Petrochemical Industrial Base in Jiangsu, the production line was still running at high speed during the holidays. "In the fourth quarter, photovoltaic installations are entering the peak season, and the market demand for related raw materials has further increased. The production line operates 24 hours a day, with a daily output of more than 1,000 tons." In the central control room, Yan Yahong, chief engineer of Sierbon Petrochemical, a subsidiary of Shenghong Holding Group, and her colleagues We pay attention to every detail of the production line at all times and "go all out to ensure quality and quantity to meet the material needs of photovoltaic companies."

;

;The vast waters of Huangmao Sea are calm and calm, and Sany Marine Heavy Industry Zhuhai Industrial Park On the self-built wharf, nearly 40 large port machinery equipment are undergoing final debugging and will be shipped to many large ports at home and abroad. In the smart manufacturing factory behind the terminal, six automated production lines are operating at full capacity, robot arms are rising and falling, sparks are flying from the automatic welding machine island, and electric reach stackers, electric forklifts, electric trucks and other products are under intense production .

;

;On October 4, in the production workshop of Fulin Precision Co., Ltd., Fucheng District, Mianyang City, Sichuan, high-end intelligent production equipment was running at high speed, and workers on the production line were busy working. This company is engaged in the research, development, production and sales of key components for intelligent electronic control of new energy vehicles, and its order volume accelerated after entering the fourth quarter. During the National Day holiday, many customers stayed in the factory, waiting for product delivery.

;

;During the National Day holiday, the construction of major engineering projects in various places continued to advance, and new progress was made in infrastructure construction.

;

;In Anhui, the construction of the G3 Tongling Yangtze River Highway and Railway Bridge is accelerating. "Everyone, pay attention to safety!" Yang Tao, a technician from the second branch of the project department, has been paying attention to construction safety on site. "The stay cable is very long and heavy. The technical difficulty of installation and construction coordination requirements are very high. We must monitor and control the whole process." In order to ensure After completing the construction period target, Yang Tao and the workers chose to spend the National Day holiday at the construction site. "I feel honored to be able to participate in the construction of major engineering projects."

;

;At the Jintian Cross-Pingwu Expressway of Guangxi Liuwu Railway More than 1,100 employees from the Liuwu Railway Bid 4 Project Department of China Railway Shanghai Engineering Bureau are working intensively at construction sites such as the Guiping North Railway Station and Guiping Bridge. "Managers and front-line workers stayed on the front line during the holidays to ensure that the Liu-Wu Railway construction was completed as scheduled." said Xiao Yanjun, head of the project department.

;

;;Serve the masses with all your heart and nbsp; In exchange for joy, peace and well-being for all families.

;

;At the home of the elderly Li Jun, a resident of Dongxiazhuang Community Family Doctor, Pingguoyuan Street, Shijingshan District, Beijing, Yan Xuling, a doctor at the community health service station, performed acupuncture treatment on him. These days, 10 community health service stations in 9 streets in Shijingshan District receive medical treatment every day, allowing people to enjoy high-quality medical services at their doorsteps.

;

;Early in the morning on October 4, Gao Lei, the regional control team leader of the Anshan Electric Power Dispatch Control Center of State Grid Liaoning Electric Power Co., Ltd. rushed to the unit to learn more about the operation of the power grid the day before. Watch the changes in various data on the big screen and monitor the operation of the power grid. "Wherever there is a problem with the equipment, we must conduct line command, power outage processing and power transmission operations as soon as possible." Gao Lei said, "If we pay more, everyone can spend the holiday with more peace of mind."

;

; During the National Day holiday, travel passenger flow in many places remained high. Relevant departments optimized travel services and strengthened safety inspections to jointly protect passengers' safe journeys.

;

;"Don't worry, I'm in front, you hold my hand." In the waiting hall of Jilin Changchun Railway Station, Ma Cong, a station passenger and member of the "Spring Appointment" love service team, helped a blind passenger to the train station. At the ticket gate, "Everyone is very enthusiastic about traveling during this holiday. We must stick to our posts and do a good job in service guarantee." Ma Cong said.

;

;“Charging piles are operating normally!” On October 4, staff from State Grid Shandong Jining Power Supply Company conducted inspections of more than 80 charging piles in 15 high-speed service areas within the jurisdiction, and identified hidden problems and hazards. Timely investigation and elimination will allow new energy vehicle owners to charge quickly, have worry-free battery life and ensure safety during holiday travel.

;

;;Strive to ensure  Guard safety;

;

;Although the position is ordinary, the responsibilities are extraordinary. People on the front line are doing their best to ensure the orderly operation of all work and protect the health and safety of the people.

;

;On October 4, at the Erlianhot Port in Inner Mongolia, Li Lei, a customs officer from the Second Railway Supervision Section of Erlian Customs, and his colleagues were ready to carry out inspection operations on the incoming China-Europe freight train containers. “During the National Day holiday, in order to ensure the stable operation of the China-Europe trains, we set up a special inspection team and established a special communication line with the railway department to fully ensure the customs clearance supervision during the holidays. The latest technological equipment is used for inspection, recording and submission of information, and the customs clearance of the trains is The efficiency has been greatly improved," Li Lei said.

;

;These days, Li Honglian, deputy secretary of the Fucheng Community Party Branch in Qiongshan District, Haikou City, Hainan, and his colleagues patrol the area every day. “There are many people in the community, so we divide them into grids and focus on key areas. Investigate fire hazards and guide civilized celebrations." In Xixiu Town, Xiuying District, Haikou City, cadres at the "12345" hotline office stick to their posts, answer calls from citizens 24 hours a day, and promptly dispatch and solve problems such as property management, city appearance and environment, and illegal parking of vehicles. . Town law enforcement officers continue to patrol in crowded places such as stations, docks, parks, shopping malls, etc. to check for various hidden dangers and maintain safety and order.

;

;Detailed inquiries, careful records, and patient explanations... As usual, Li Su, a doctor in the emergency department of Qinghai University Affiliated Hospital, started busy early in the morning. "Racing every second for rescue is the daily routine of the emergency department." During this National Day holiday, Li Su and his colleagues stayed on the emergency front line. "Even during the break, their mobile phones were kept on, responding to emergencies at any time, and doing their best to protect the lives and health of the people."

;

;During the National Day holiday, the commanders and soldiers of the Chinese People's Liberation Army and the armed police force were loyal to their duties and protected the security of the country and the people. The public security officers stayed at their posts and strengthened patrols to ensure that the people had a happy and peaceful holiday.

;

;In the past few days, Shanghai's major transportation hubs, landmark attractions and shopping malls have experienced heavy passenger flow. Officers and soldiers of the Shanghai Armed Police Corps have stayed at their posts to strengthen order maintenance in key areas and protect the safety of the people. Second Class Sergeant Shan Hongxin has participated in Nanjing Road duty nine times during holidays. “I feel very proud to be able to protect the peace of the people!”

;

;(Comprehensive reporters Zhang Yikai, Cheng Yuanzhou, Wang Mingfeng , Xu Jing, Pang Geping, Pan Junqiang, Hao Yingcan, Liu Jiahua, Zheng Zhiwen, Hou Linliang, Zhang Xi, Sun Haitian, Jia Fengfeng, Li Zhuoer)

; Thu, 05 Oct 2023 05:26:06 +0800 01版要闻 - 前8月港口完成外贸货物吞吐量同比增9.7%（新数据 新看点）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/05/nw.D110000renmrb_20231005_2-01.htm
;Thursday, October 5, 2023
; ;

;Our newspaper, Beijing, October 4th  (Reporter Han Xin) The reporter recently learned from the Ministry of Transport: Since the beginning of this year, my country's international logistics operations have generally continued to improve, and the foreign trade throughput of the country's ports has increased rapidly. In the first eight months, the country's ports completed a foreign trade cargo throughput of 3.34 billion tons, a year-on-year increase of 9.7% and an increase of 16.9% over the same period in 2019.

;

;Looking at aviation, international air cargo volume has grown steadily. As of the end of August, the industry had 252 all-cargo aircraft flying to 22 countries, with a total cargo and mail volume of 10.324 million tons, a year-on-year increase of 4.9%.

;

;Looking at ports, the cargo handling capacity of major land ports continues to improve. At present, my country has signed intergovernmental international road transport agreements with 21 countries co-building the “Belt and Road”. In August, the cargo volume at major land ports such as Alashankou, Horgos, Erenhot, Manzhouli and Suifenhe increased by 89.1% year-on-year.

;

;Looking at shipping, the international shipping service network is constantly improving. Since this year, express delivery companies have accelerated the integration of various international logistics resources by sea, land, air and rail, steadily promoted the construction of international postal channels, and improved the layout of overseas warehouses and distribution centers.

;

;The relevant person in charge of the Transportation Services Department of the Ministry of Transport said that in the next step, they will continue to work with relevant departments to promote the construction of a modern international logistics supply chain system, smooth the logistics network, and accelerate the construction of "Two Coasts and Ten Corridors" international logistics. The major channel will vigorously cultivate modern logistics enterprises with global competitiveness and expand and extend the international logistics service network.

;; Thu, 05 Oct 2023 05:26:06 +0800 01版要闻 - 流动的中国生机勃勃（走进市场看信心·聚焦中秋国庆假期）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/05/nw.D110000renmrb_20231005_3-01.htm
;Thursday, October 5, 2023
; ;

;Beijing South Railway Station maintains peak operation, sending an average of 202,000 passengers per day; the average daily passenger flow of Shanghai Pudong and Hongqiao Airports The total traffic volume of the entire Chongqing Expressway network exceeded 1.93 million vehicles on September 29, setting a new high for a single day during the National Day holiday...

;

;On this Mid-Autumn Festival and National Day During the holidays, “travel” becomes a high-frequency word. The latest data shows that on the sixth day of the holiday, railways, highways, waterways and civil aviation are expected to carry 56.697 million passengers, a year-on-year increase of 58.4%. The Ministry of Transport predicts that with the overall recovery of commercial passenger traffic on railways, highways, waterways, and civil aviation, the number of cross-regional personnel movements in society will reach 2.05 billion, with an average daily average of 257 million, an average daily increase of 11.5% over the same period in 2019. . People enjoy their travels and things flow smoothly. A mobile China is full of vitality, demonstrating the strong driving force of our country's economy.

;

;;Passenger flow has rebounded significantly, highlighting the recovery of domestic demand and the recovery of production;

;

;Judging from holiday travel data, the total number of daily passengers across the country has remained at a high level of 52 million. , single-day passenger traffic increased by more than 50% compared with the same period last year.

;

;“Coinciding with the Mid-Autumn Festival and the National Day holiday, the demand for visiting relatives and traveling is strong, the flow of people in the whole society has increased significantly, and long-distance travel across provinces has increased significantly.” said the relevant person in charge of the Ministry of Transport.

;

;The high-speed rail station is bustling with people. An average of 409,000 passengers are sent every day, and 1,340 high-speed trains are added... Guangzhou South Railway Station has comprehensively improved its transportation capacity. "In the six days before the holiday, a total of 2.544 million passengers were sent, an increase of 17.5% over 2019. During the peak period, Guangzhou South Railway Station adopted methods such as running peak line trains to ensure smooth passenger travel." Xie Chaofang, Chief of the Marketing Section of the Passenger Transport Department of Guangzhou Railway Group explain.

;

;The terminal is crowded. The music was cheerful, the lanterns were twinkling, and the carefully arranged festival-themed landscape in the T3 terminal of Beijing Capital International Airport attracted many tourists to stop and take photos. "In the five days before the holiday, the average daily passenger volume exceeded 168,000, quadrupling year-on-year." Xie Yue, senior operations manager of the Capital Airport Operations Control Center, said that the airport has ushered in a travel peak, and domestic aviation business has grown steadily, with the number of flights exceeding 2019 same period level.

;

;The rural tour route is busy with traffic. Drive east for two hours along the Shenjiahu Expressway and enter a rural road. You can see flowers and trees on both sides and undulating mountains in the distance. "The 10-kilometer-long rural road connects tea mountains, lakes and other scenic spots, attracting many tourists." Ma Xinnong, Party branch secretary of Tanlongqiao Village, Heping Town, Changxing County, Huzhou, Zhejiang, said that in the first four days of the holiday, more than 4,500 people visited A self-driving car drove to the bank of Xiamu Lake, and more than 15,000 tourists came to visit.

;

;In the Chuanshan Port area of ​​Zhoushan Port in Ningbo, Zhejiang, ocean-going ships are constantly coming and going, and all 11 berths are in operation. In the Hangzhou Asian Games Logistics Center, dozens of unmanned forklifts and multiple inventory drones shuttle back and forth in the 72,000-square-meter warehouse area.

;

;“In the past half month, the logistics center has processed more than 10,000 pieces of materials every day. Since its launch, the total mileage of logistics vehicles has been nearly 60,000 kilometers, and a total of nearly 200,000 pieces of materials have been sent and received, effectively ensuring the efficient deployment of materials for the Asian Games. ." said Xin Zhaofei, head of the Asian Games project team of YTO Express.

;

;People enjoy their travels and goods flow smoothly, highlighting the recovery of domestic demand and the recovery of production.

;

;;Infrastructure continues to be upgraded, and the road network system has strong support;

;

;Super large "traffic" depends on super strength. Behind people's enjoyment of their travels and the smooth flow of goods is the increasingly perfect road network system and stronger infrastructure levels.

;

;The opening of the new railway line will make travel "a thousand miles faster".

;

;“It takes about an hour to get to Quanzhou from Fuzhou in the morning.” On October 2, Cai Yunjia, a citizen of Fuzhou, Fujian Province, took the G5139 Fuxing train from Fuzhou South Railway Station with her family to Quanzhou to participate in the " Celebrating the Double Festival and Checking in to World Heritage" activities.

;

;On September 28, the Fuzhou-Xiamen High-speed Railway was officially opened to traffic. Fuzhou to Xiamen can be reached in 55 minutes at the fastest, creating a "one-hour living circle" between the two places.

;

;This holiday, many new high-speed rail lines will make their “debuts”. After the Guangzhou-Shantou High-speed Railway was put into operation on September 26, it had carried a total of 276,000 passengers by October 3. The Shanghai-Nanjing High-speed Railway along the Yangtze River, which was put into operation on September 28, had carried a total of more than 160,000 passengers.

;

;New routes have been launched, allowing travel to be "on the go".

;

;At about 22:00 on October 3, flight CZ3359 landed steadily at Kashgar Laining International Airport in Xinjiang. This is a new route launched by China Southern Airlines more than a month ago and the first in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area. Direct flight to Kashgar.

;

;As soon as the plane landed, many tourists raised their mobile phones to take pictures. "In the past, the connecting journey was long, but now there are direct flights, which can take 6 hours from Guangzhou." Mr. Wu, a tourist from Guangzhou, said excitedly. It is understood that since the opening of the new route, China Southern Airlines has guaranteed more than 6,000 passenger trips, effectively promoting border tourism.

;

;On September 28, China Eastern Airlines launched a new direct round-trip route from Shanghai to Istanbul, and the flight was almost full; on September 30, China Airlines launched the Chongqing-Wenshan-Shenzhen route, and the passenger load factor reached 100% on the day of the launch. … In recent days, many airlines have added new routes to provide passengers with new options for holiday travel.

;

;The completion of the new expressway has made self-driving travel even more popular.

;

;Watch the "Village BA", taste special delicacies, and feel the red culture... Mr. Zhang, a Chongqing citizen, headed west along the Chongqing-Zun Expansion Expressway. After driving for only two hours, he experienced an immersive tour. On September 29, the Chongqing-Zunyi Expanded Expressway was opened to traffic, shortening the opening time from Chongqing to Zunyi from 3 hours to 2 hours.

;

;Yunsan Expressway, Jiwei Expressway and other lines are all open to traffic; the Guinan High-speed Railway is opened and the Qinghai-Tibet Railway Xining-Golmud Section Upgrading Project is put into operation; major projects such as Pinglu Canal and Huangmao Sea Cross-sea Channel continue Promote... Today's China has built the world's largest high-speed railway network, highway network, postal express network and world-class port group. The main skeleton spatial pattern of the national comprehensive three-dimensional transportation network has basically been formed, and the connection efficiency of various transportation modes is accelerating. .

;

;;Overall planning and dispatching are orderly, and transportation services are better;

;

;Timely response, comprehensive consideration, and optimized services... During this holiday, various regions and departments have taken multiple measures We should work together to create a healthier, more comfortable and safer travel environment.

;

;——Optimize transportation capacity allocation to ensure mass travel.

;

;On average, more than 11,500 passenger trains are planned to run every day, an increase of more than 1,850 trains compared with the daily number. Among them, more than 12,000 trains are scheduled to run on the peak day. The average daily passenger seat capacity is expected to increase by 18.5% compared with the same period in 2019. ...In response to the extremely large passenger flow, railways across the country have implemented peak train operation charts and increased transport capacity.

;

;In order to fully tap the transportation potential, the railway department accurately deploys "one map per day" to dynamically meet the travel needs of short-distance passengers. China Railway Harbin Bureau Group Co., Ltd. opened 119 additional passenger trains to maximize its transportation capacity. The four express entry halls of Beijing South Railway Station are opened on a regular basis every day, and emergency passenger passages are set up to optimize the travel experience.

;

;——Speed ​​up transformation and upgrading and improve travel efficiency.

;

;Online registration and authentication, check-in, security check, and boarding can be done by "swiping your face"; online luggage intelligent measuring machine can measure the volume and weight of luggage in 5 seconds, and automatically match different airlines , baggage allowance requirements for cabin classes... Departing from Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport, a series of smart airport services help passengers travel efficiently.

;

;“Currently, all 234 self-service check-in machines and 114 self-service baggage check-in machines equipped at the airport have been opened.” Yang Hongyu, director of the Information Technology Department of Baiyun International Airport Co., Ltd., said that during peak periods, it serves 77,000 passengers every day. number of people, effectively reducing the waiting time in line.

;

;——Accelerate the integration of transportation and tourism and enhance unique experiences.

;

;In Yancheng, Jiangsu Province, there is an endless stream of passengers coming and going in the high-speed service area of ​​the Huai-Xu Expressway. "I came to the service area to have a rest. I didn't expect that there is also a dinosaur park and a dream castle here." Wang Ke, a tourist from Xuzhou, said that it looks like a shopping mall and a paradise, and it is worthy of being a "new tourist check-in place." In recent years, Jiangsu Communications Investment has completed the transformation and upgrading of 7 pairs of service areas along the line, transforming a single business format into a diversified commercial complex and creating a number of small but beautiful characteristic themed service areas.

;

;Transportation is the "main artery" and "pioneer" of economic development. Through the Mid-Autumn Festival and National Day holiday, we can see that high-quality transportation is injecting new momentum into China-style modernization.

;; Thu, 05 Oct 2023 05:26:06 +0800 01版要闻 - 铆足干劲 勇毅前行（今日谈）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/05/nw.D110000renmrb_20231005_4-01.htm
;Thursday, October 5, 2023
; ;

;Sincere voice and high spirit. The construction of the Shenzhen-Zhongshan Corridor, the Baotou-Yinjiang High-speed Railway, and the Beijing-Xiongong Expressway are advancing in an orderly manner, and the builders of major projects "have no days off to work on their posts"; the Haoji Railway, Tangbao Railway, and Qinhuangdao Port have strengthened coordination and organization, and energy transportation ensures that "every ton of coal must be "Fighting, every column must be protected"; the land of Longjiang is harvested mechanically, soybean yields are measured, and straw is returned to the fields. Farmers are busy. "The black soil is our golden rice bowl. As long as we work hard, the saline-alkali land can also become a river of rice and grain." '". During the National Day, hundreds of millions of Chinese people are full of joy and pride, marching on a new journey with high spirits and high spirits towards the future.

;

;At the reception celebrating the 74th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China, General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized: "Unity is strength, and confidence is stronger than gold. We must strengthen our confidence, inspire our spirit, work together in unity, and continue to climb over the hurdles." , overcome difficulties, and move forward unswervingly towards the grand goal of building a strong country and rejuvenating the nation!" Achievements rely on down-to-earth struggle, and motivation comes from a high-spirited spirit. Today, when the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation shows unprecedented bright prospects, the Chinese people are more confident, self-reliant, and self-reliant. Their ambition, courage, and confidence are unprecedentedly inspired, and they are writing the great history of China's development in the new era with a hundredfold confidence.

;

;The new journey is an expedition full of glory and dreams. If we firmly cultivate the spiritual power to realize national rejuvenation, always maintain a striving attitude of forging ahead, daring to be the first, and facing difficulties, maintain strategic focus, enhance confidence in victory, and be full of energy and move forward courageously, we will surely be able to gather an invincible force. The majestic power has successfully promoted the great historical cause of building a strong country and rejuvenating the nation.

; Thu, 05 Oct 2023 05:26:06 +0800 01版要闻 - 图片报道http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/05/nw.D110000renmrb_20231005_5-01.htm
;Thursday, October 5, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;October 3, Drum Tower Pedestrian Street, Ningbo City, Zhejiang Province , citizens are enjoying the night view.
;Photo by Hu Xuejun (People’s Vision)

;
; ;;;;; ; ;;;
;;
;

;On October 1, "Four Good Rural Roads" attracted tourists to Fanshan Town, Lujiang County, Hefei City, Anhui Province.
;Photographed by Li Hongbing (Photo China)

;
; ;;;;; ; ;;;
;;
;

;On October 1, tourists were playing in the old street in Qilihe District, Lanzhou City, Gansu Province.

;

;Photo by Su Yang (published by Xinhua News Agency)

;
; ;

; During the National Day holiday, people all over the country enjoy rich Colorful ways to enjoy the holidays.

;; Thu, 05 Oct 2023 05:26:06 +0800 02版要闻 - 让乡亲们早日住进新房（点赞新时代）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/05/nw.D110000renmrb_20231005_1-02.htm
;Thursday, October 5, 2023
; ;

;In the festive atmosphere during the festival, thousands of workers are sticking to their jobs.

;

;On the front line of rebuilding homes, builders race against time; at the Hangzhou Asian Games venue, volunteers serve enthusiastically... perseverance, interpreting responsibility and responsibility, guarding the festive reunion of thousands of families.

;

; ——Editor  Lu Wencheng, deputy director of the Zhuang Village Committee, went out and headed south to the home of villager He Junyun.

;

;Housing reconstruction and construction here also continues during the holidays.

;

;"Auntie, how is the house repaired? Have the floor heating pipes been laid?" In the yard, four or five workers were mixing cement. Lu Wencheng pushed up his glasses and looked closely at the progress.

;

;"The path is coming." 63-year-old He Junyun stopped what he was doing and said, "It's done, we can lay the floor tiles soon."

;

;The Ding family Zhuangcun was severely affected by the heavy rainfall in Zhuozhou this year. The southern area of ​​the village where He Junyun's home is located is less than 1 kilometer away from the branch of the Beijuma River, and floods flooded into the village. After identification by relevant departments, Dingjiazhuang Village has 29 D-level dilapidated houses and more than 100 C-level dilapidated houses that cannot meet the requirements for normal use, most of which are concentrated in the south of the village. In order to allow the villagers to move into their new houses as soon as possible, Lu Wencheng goes to the south of the village almost every day to keep an eye on the progress of the repairs and coordinate to solve the villagers' needs.

;

;After looking at the progress, Lu Wencheng checked inside and out again and confirmed that there were no hidden dangers. Before leaving, he said, "It's getting cold. If you have any problems, feel free to ask them. The village committee will help solve them." Then he turned around and walked to the next house to check the situation.

;

;Lu Wencheng went door to door to understand the disaster situation and coordinate the reconstruction work. Today, more than 90% of Class C dilapidated buildings in the village have been repaired, and demolition and construction work has begun on Class D dilapidated buildings.

;

;Towards noon, Lu Wencheng’s cell phone rang. It was a call from Zhang Aijuan, a big grower in the village: "The wheat that was planted on trial has sprouted." "I have to go and have a look." Lu Wencheng said I disconnected the phone and rushed excitedly to the wheat fields in the east of the village.

;

;“This year’s soil condition is different from previous years. After watering, the soil is thin and full of bacteria, so wheat planting must be more precise.” The suitable sowing period for wheat is coming soon, and I am worried that watered soil will affect the growth of wheat, Lu Wencheng I came up with the idea of ​​trial planting in advance - asking large growers to plant multiple suitable varieties in small plots first, then apply fertilizer to sterilize and increase fertilizer, and prepare to select the best growing ones for large-scale planting.

;

;Walking to the fields to the east of the village, three small experimental fields with an area of ​​about 1 square meter are sprouting with greenery. Lu Wencheng squatted down and recorded his growth with his mobile phone. "These were just planted a few days ago. The seedlings in the middle are dense and green and grow best. You can observe them again." Lu Wencheng plans to organize a visit with the villagers in a few days.

;

;He returned to the village committee and continued to collect statistics on reconstruction data and distribute donated materials... By the time Lu Wencheng returned home, it was already 9 o'clock in the evening.

;

;Under the light, several cracks can be seen on the walls of the house, and the food on the table is still steaming. "The damage to our house is relatively minor and we haven't bothered to repair it yet. We'll start sorting it out slowly after everything in the village is settled," said Jia Pengyuan, Lu Wencheng's wife.

;

;During this period, Lu Wencheng and Jia Pengyuan were used to going out early and coming back late every day for recovery and reconstruction. The steaming meals are her support for Lu Wencheng: "The village needs him, and we can't hold back. I take good care of my family, and he takes care of everyone with peace of mind, and we can complete the reconstruction as soon as possible."

;

;After dinner, Lu Wencheng’s cell phone rang again. There is an open space in the north of the village where post-disaster reconstruction materials from Dongchengfang Town are stored. "Tonight, a batch of steel bars and sand for the reconstruction of dilapidated buildings will arrive. I will go over to check them and put them in storage." With that, Lu Wencheng walked out of the house quickly.

;; Thu, 05 Oct 2023 05:26:06 +0800 02版要闻 - 给家门口的盛会出份力（点赞新时代）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/05/nw.D110000renmrb_20231005_2-02.htm
;Thursday, October 5, 2023
; ;

;During the festival, the Hangzhou Asian Games is in full swing. For Miao Yingying, apart from excitement, there is also a different kind of busyness.

;

;After lunch on October 3, Miao Yingying changed into city volunteer clothes and a red vest and came to Gongshu Canal Sports Park. Her task today is to provide off-field guidance for hockey games and take charge of social parking spots.

;

;There are clear road signs at the points, and Miao Yingying also did her homework early and memorized the directions of travel to different venues. Commanding vehicles, guiding the audience, answering inquiries... During more than three hours of volunteer service, Miao Yingying stood the whole time with a smile on her face.

;

;Miao Yingying is a staff member of the Hemu Street Federation of Trade Unions in Gongshu District. During this time, she not only served as a volunteer, but also did a good job in security work in the community. She and her colleagues went to the chemical fiber community in late August to serve 25 buildings and 1,125 households. I walk around communities and streets all day long, taking tens of thousands of steps every day. "Every time I help everyone solve a problem, I feel a special sense of accomplishment." Miao Yingying said.

;

;Looking through work notes, Miao Yingying’s recent work includes safety promotion, safety inspections, neighborly mutual assistance, civilized persuasion, etc. She applied her work experience in the community to the Asian Games protection work and felt that she was also a part of the Hangzhou Asian Games.

;

;The sky is getting dark, and the day’s volunteer guidance work is over. Miao Yingying got on her electric bike and hurried home. On both sides of the road, thousands of lights gradually lit up. Under the bright moonlight, the wind along the way blew away the tiredness on her body.

;

;As soon as I opened the door, I smelled the familiar aroma of food. The mother, who came all the way from her hometown in Wenzhou to help take care of her children, had already prepared dinner for the family. While eating, she shared her experiences with her mother and children.

;

;And Miao Yingying's lover Xiao Ruiwen is still on duty on the streets of Tonglu.

;

;Xiao Ruiwen is the captain of the water division squadron of the Tonglu Traffic Police Brigade of Hangzhou Public Security Bureau. Because the equestrian competition of the Hangzhou Asian Games was held in Tonglu County, Xiao Ruiwen has been on the front line since early August.

;

;“We hope to take a tour from the perspective of tourists.” On the other end of the phone, Xiao Ruiwen told reporters that in order to comprehensively improve the road security level around the Asian Games venues, he and his colleagues have visited the venues seven or eight times. Check the surrounding area carefully. Xiao Ruiwen not only has to maintain traffic order outside the venue, but also coordinates horse transportation, duty along the road and other matters, without any carelessness.

;

;Due to work, the couple meets no more than 2 days a week, and over time they have formed a tacit understanding. After a while, Xiao Ruiwen finished what he was doing and made another video call. The couple were chatting, and their son, who is in the second grade of junior high school this year, rushed to talk to his father. After hearing this, the younger daughter also came over, and the family laughed and laughed.

;

;At the other end of the video, Xiao Ruiwen suggested: "How about we go on a trip as a family when we are done with the work?" Miao Yingying nodded and said, "Don't worry about being on duty, I will guard the post at home."

;

; P>;

;"The Hangzhou Asian Games is a grand event at our doorstep. Both of us as husband and wife can play a part in it, so this holiday is very meaningful." Miao Yingying said.

;; Thu, 05 Oct 2023 05:26:06 +0800 02版要闻 - 发挥独特优势 加快“二十一世纪海上丝绸之路”核心区建设（共建“一带一路”·权威访谈）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/05/nw.D110000renmrb_20231005_3-02.htm
;Thursday, October 5, 2023
; ;

;Fujian is the eastern starting point of the Maritime Silk Road and the core area of ​​the 21st Century Maritime Silk Road.

;

;Guo Ningning, member of the Standing Committee of the Fujian Provincial Party Committee and Executive Vice Governor, said in an interview with a reporter from Xinhua News Agency that over the past ten years since the "Belt and Road" initiative was proposed, Fujian has always kept in mind the instructions and adhered to a blueprint to draw it to the end, giving full play to its unique Advantages, carry forward the excellent tradition of fighting hard to win, and daring to be the first, actively playing a role in the joint construction of the "Belt and Road", and achieving fruitful results in the construction of the core area of ​​the "21st Century Maritime Silk Road".

;

;;Infrastructure interconnection;

;

;Fujian has outstanding location advantages and plays an important role in connecting the main artery of the southeastern coast in the domestic and international dual circulation. An important node and channel of the “One Belt, One Road” initiative.

;

; Focusing on building an important hub for interconnection of the "21st Century Maritime Silk Road", Fujian organized the implementation of a number of landmark projects such as "Silk Road Maritime Transport", "Silk Road Flying" and "Digital Silk Road", and initially built A "four-in-one" channel for sea, land and air network has been established.

;

;At sea, "Silk Road Shipping" continues to improve. 317 companies and institutions around the world have joined the "Silk Road Shipping" alliance, connecting 131 ports in 43 countries and regions. "Silk Road Shipping" It has become an important platform for the global industry to discuss port and shipping cooperation, jointly build Silk Road corridors, and share economic and trade prosperity;

;

;On land, China-Europe freight trains will be launched more frequently, sea-rail combined transport, and multimodal transport will be implemented to achieve Linkage between land and sea at home and abroad, and mutual assistance between east and west;

;

;In the air, we will solidly build the "Flying Silk Road" and create a number of major interconnections such as Fuzhou and Xiamen, two "21st Century Maritime Silk Road" gateway hub airports. Interconnection projects have opened 85 international routes, reaching major cities around the world;

;

;On the Internet, we actively empower the "Digital Silk Road" and launch the "21st Century Maritime Silk Road" series of remote sensing satellites to create the "21st Century Maritime Silk Road" series of remote sensing satellites. The "Century Maritime Silk Road" Satellite Data Service Center provides ocean surveying and mapping and other related services to countries and regions co-building the "Belt and Road".

;

;;Economic and trade cooperation has continued to expand;

;

;In the past ten years, Fujian has achieved the goal of realizing the “Belt and Road Initiative” through resource complementation, trade interoperability and industrial mutual promotion with the countries co-building the “Belt and Road”. Joint development and joint prosperity.

;

;Fujian has introduced high-quality industrial projects such as Sino-Saudi Gulei Ethylene, which has effectively promoted the high-quality development of key industrial clusters such as petrochemicals, new materials, new energy, new generation information technology, and advanced manufacturing in the province. Over the past ten years, Fujian has invested in nearly 1,400 projects in 95 countries that jointly build the “Belt and Road”. A large number of Fujian companies have established a foothold in the international market and achieved a global layout of industrial chains. Over the past ten years, the total import and export trade between Fujian and the countries co-building the "Belt and Road" has been approximately 4.4 trillion yuan. Last year, the import and export trade between Fujian and the countries co-building the "Belt and Road" was 735.1 billion yuan, an increase of 142% over 2012.

;

;Fujian has nearly 16 million overseas residents all over the world, about 80% of whom are concentrated in Southeast Asia. Fujian regards Southeast Asia as a key area to promote the construction of the core area of ​​the "21st Century Maritime Silk Road". At present, ASEAN has become Fujian's largest trading partner, the second largest foreign investment destination and an important source of foreign investment.

;

;In January this year, China-Indonesia and China-Philippines "Twin Parks" were approved by the State Council and accelerated their construction in Fuzhou and Zhangzhou respectively, striving to promote the interconnection of facilities, policy reciprocity and industrial interconnection of the "Twin Parks". , mutual promotion of trade, aiming to build a new platform for efficient industrial collaboration, explore new models of international production capacity cooperation, and create a new highland for innovative development of economic and trade cooperation along the “One Belt, One Road” initiative. Currently, 620 commercial and trade companies and 66 investment projects have been established in the China-Indonesia "Two Parks" Chinese Park, while Fujian companies have deployed 36 investment industrial projects in the Indonesian Park.

;

;As a pioneer province in reform and opening up, Fujian also has institutional open carriers such as special economic zones, free trade pilot zones, cross-strait integrated development demonstration zones, "Maritime Silk Road Central Legal District", and BRICS innovation bases.十年来，福建充分发挥这些平台集成化、系统性的开放优势，与共建“一带一路”国家和地区在产业投资、跨境电商、商事服务、科技创新、能源资源等重要领域开展更加广泛深入的合作，构建起全方位、多层次、宽领域的对外开放新格局。

;

;;民心相通持续增进;

;

;“一株草，万里情。”20多年前，来自福建的菌草技术开启“全球之旅”，沿途播撒下友谊的种子，为广大发展中国家人民脱贫致富提供了中国智慧，诠释了人类命运共同体的生动实践。

;

;民相亲，心相通。福建“海丝”文化底蕴深厚，借助海外闽籍乡亲的力量，积极与共建国家和地区分享数字福建、海洋强省、生态省建设、摆脱贫困等福建经验，促进文化认同和民心相通，福建“朋友圈”越来越大，已经与相关国家建立了124对友城关系。

;

;下一步，福建将畅通“大通道”，完善“陆海空天网”综合立体交通网络，加快新型基础设施建设，实现贯通南北、连接东西、通江达海、联通全球；搭建“大平台”，用足用好自由贸易试验区、海峡两岸融合发展示范区等开放载体，持续吸引国内外各类资源要素在福建集聚，促进双向投资贸易，共享丝路繁荣；塑造“大品牌”，持续推进“丝路海运”“两国双园”“海丝中央法务区”等旗舰工程，打造更多具有福建特色的国际合作品牌。

;

;郭宁宁说，新时代新征程上，福建将认真学习贯彻习近平总书记关于共建“一带一路”的重要论述精神，全面提升“21世纪海上丝绸之路”核心区建设能级，充分发挥核心区先行示范作用，持续推进高水平对外开放，在共建“一带一路”中进一步彰显福建的担当作为，谱写中国式现代化的福建篇章。

;

;（新华社福州10月4日电  记者李慧颖、董建国）

; Thu, 05 Oct 2023 05:26:06 +0800 02版要闻 - 坚守岗位作贡献 奋斗实干建新功http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/05/nw.D110000renmrb_20231005_4-02.htm
;2023年10月05日星期四
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;国庆假期，劳动者坚守岗位、奋战一线。照片自上而下依次为：
;河北石家庄市体育大街互通立交施工现场，工人在进行桥梁施工。
;张晓峰摄（新华社发）
;北京城市照明管理中心的技术员在维修路灯。
;新华社记者李欣摄
;重庆黔江区正阳工业园区，一家丝绸企业的职工在车间工作。
;杨敏摄（人民视觉）
;贵州安顺经济技术开发区，消防救援人员在检查安全装备。
;陈熙摄（新华社发）

;
; ;

;习近平总书记强调：“强国建设、民族复兴的宏伟目标令人鼓舞，催人奋进。我们要只争朝夕，坚定历史自信，增强历史主动，坚持守正创新，保持战略定力，发扬斗争精神，勇于攻坚克难，不断为强国建设、民族复兴伟业添砖加瓦、增光添彩！”

;

;国庆假期，从城市社区到广袤乡村，从生产一线到旅游景区，许多人坚守岗位、默默奉献，在辛勤工作中度过节日，以奋斗实干建新功。

;

;;奋战一线  加紧施工;

;

;连日来，工人们持续奋战在一线，争分夺秒，全力保障建设和生产进度。

;

;黑龙江哈尔滨电气集团锅炉公司重容分厂，电焊组焊工们早早来到车间，预热、调试、施焊，车间内焊花四溅。组长程强额头满是汗珠，钻进大型筒体部件内，在部件内壁留下道道锃亮的焊缝。“这是显热回收半废锅流程气化炉，具有节约能源、碳转化率高等特点。”程强说，“假期坚守岗位，让一件件产品高质量按时交付，我们干得有劲头！”

;

;晶莹剔透的颗粒翻转跳动，传输带自动封包……在江苏连云港石化产业基地，生产线在假期依旧高速运转。“进入四季度，光伏装机迎来旺季，相关原料的市场需求进一步增加，生产线24小时运转，每天产量1000多吨。”中控室内，盛虹控股集团旗下的斯尔邦石化主任工程师严亚红和同事们随时关注着生产线的每个细节，“全力以赴，保质保量，满足光伏企业的材料需求。”

;

;广阔无垠的黄茅海水域风平浪静，三一海洋重工珠海产业园的自建码头上，近40台大港机设备正在进行最后调试，即将装船发往国内外多个大型港口。码头背后的智能制造工厂里，6条自动化产线满负荷运转，机器人手臂此起彼落，自动焊机岛火花四溅，电动正面吊、电动堆高机、电动集卡等产品正在紧张生产中。

;

;10月4日，四川绵阳市涪城区富临精工股份有限公司的生产车间里，一台台高端智能生产设备高速运转，生产线上工人忙碌工作。这家企业从事新能源汽车智能电控关键零部件的研发、生产和销售，进入四季度后订单量加速增长。国庆假期，很多客户守在厂子里，等待产品交付。

;

;国庆假期，各地重大工程项目建设持续推进，基础设施建设取得新进展。

;

;在安徽，G3铜陵长江公铁大桥建设加快推进。“大家注意安全！”杨涛是项目部二分部技术员，一直在现场关注着施工安全，“斜拉索很长很重，安装的技术难度和施工协调要求非常高，必须全程盯控。”为了保证完成工期节点目标，杨涛和工人们都选择在工地度过国庆假期，“能参与重大工程项目建设，我觉得很荣幸。”

;

;在广西柳梧铁路金田跨平武高速特大桥、桂平北站等施工现场，来自中铁上海工程局柳梧铁路4标项目部的1100多名员工正在紧张施工。“管理人员和一线工友假期坚守一线，确保柳梧铁路建设如期完成。”项目部负责人肖延军说。

;

;;尽心尽力  服务群众;

;

;节日里，许多劳动者不辞辛劳、坚守岗位，用自己的努力付出、温情服务，换来欢乐祥和、万家安康。

;

;在北京石景山区苹果园街道东下庄社区家庭医生签约居民李俊老人的家里，社区卫生服务站医生闫旭玲为他进行针灸治疗。这些天，石景山区9个街道的10家社区卫生服务站连日接诊，让老百姓在家门口享受优质医疗服务。

;

;10月4日一大早，国网辽宁电力有限公司鞍山电力调度控制中心地区调控班班长高雷就赶到单位，详细了解了前一天电网运行情况，在调度大厅紧盯着大屏上各项数据的变化，监控电网运行情况。“哪里的设备出现问题，我们必须第一时间进行线路指挥、停电处理和送电操作。”高雷说，“我们多付出一点，大家的节日就能过得更安心一点。”

;

;国庆假期，多地出行客流保持高位运行，相关部门优化出行服务、强化安全检查，共同守护旅客平安旅途。

;

;“请放心，我在前面，您牵着我的手。”吉林长春火车站候车大厅内，车站客运员、“春之约”爱心服务班组成员马丛扶着盲人乘客走向检票口，“这个假期大家出行热情高涨，我们更要坚守岗位，做好服务保障工作。”马丛说。

;

;“充电桩运行正常！”10月4日，国网山东济宁供电公司工作人员对辖区内15个高速服务区的80余台充电桩开展巡检，对发现的问题隐患及时排查消除，让新能源车主假日出行充电快捷、续航无忧，保障安全。

;

;;全力保障  守护平安;

;

;岗位虽平凡，职责不平凡。坚守一线的人们全力保障各项工作有序运转，守护人民群众健康、平安。

;

;10月4日，内蒙古二连浩特口岸，二连海关铁路监管二科关员李磊和同事已整装待发，准备对入境中欧班列集装箱开展查验作业。“国庆假期，为保障中欧班列稳定运行，我们组建查验专班，和铁路部门建立沟通专线，全力保障节假日通关监管工作，查验、记录、提交信息都用上了最新的科技设备，班列通关效率大大提高。”李磊说。

;

;这些天，海南海口市琼山区府城社区党支部副书记李红莲每天都会和同事在辖区巡查，“社区人员较多，我们分网格、包重点，在辖区内人员密集场所排查消防隐患，引导文明过节。”在海口市秀英区西秀镇，“12345”热线办的干部们坚守岗位，24小时接听市民来电，及时调度解决物业管理、市容环境、车辆违停等问题。镇执法人员在车站、码头、公园、商场等人员密集场所持续巡查，排查各类隐患，维护安全秩序。

;

;详细询问、认真记录、耐心解释……和往常一样，青海大学附属医院急诊接诊科大夫李肃一大早就开始忙碌。“争分夺秒救护，是急诊科的日常。”这个国庆假期，李肃和同事们坚守在急诊一线，“即使是在休息时段，手机也保持开机，随时响应突发情况，全力守护群众生命健康。”

;

;国庆假期，中国人民解放军指战员、武警部队官兵忠于职守，守护国家和人民安全。广大公安干警坚守岗位，加强执勤巡逻，保障人民群众度过欢乐祥和的假期。

;

;连日来，上海各大交通枢纽、地标景点和广场商圈迎来大客流，武警上海总队官兵坚守执勤哨位，加强对重点区域秩序维护，守护百姓平安。二级上士单洪鑫，已先后9次在假期参与南京路执勤任务，“能守护百姓安宁，我感到十分自豪！”

;

;（综合本报记者张艺开、程远州、王明峰、徐靖、庞革平、潘俊强、郝迎灿、刘佳华、郑智文、侯琳良、张枨、孙海天、贾丰丰、李卓尔报道）

;; Thu, 05 Oct 2023 05:26:06 +0800 02版要闻 - 图片报道http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/05/nw.D110000renmrb_20231005_5-02.htm
;2023年10月05日星期四
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;

;
; ;

;中秋国庆期间，中欧班列（武汉）始发站中国铁路武汉局集团有限公司吴家山站计划开出中欧班列7列，返程到站的中欧班列有10列左右。吴家山站干部职工坚守岗位，确保始发中欧班列安全准点开行，返程班列无缝对接后续相关查验、交付等工作。图为吴家山站。 

;

;吴  君  苏庆丰摄影报道

;; Thu, 05 Oct 2023 05:26:06 +0800 02版要闻 - 流动的中国生机勃勃（走进市场看信心·聚焦中秋国庆假期）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/05/nw.D110000renmrb_20231005_6-02.htm
;2023年10月05日星期四
; ;

;北京南站维持峰值运营，日均发送旅客20.2万人次；上海浦东、虹桥两大机场日均客流量32.5万人次，同比增长131.7%；重庆高速9月29日全路网总车流量超193万辆次，创历年国庆假期单日车流量新高……

;

;在这个中秋国庆假期，“出行”成为高频词。最新数据显示，假期第六天，铁路、公路、水路、民航预计发送旅客5669.7万人次，同比增长58.4%。交通运输部预计，随着铁路、公路、水路、民航营业性客运量全面回升，全社会跨区域人员流动量将达20.5亿人次，日均达2.57亿人次，比2019年同期日均增长11.5%。人享其行、物畅其流，流动的中国生机勃勃，彰显我国经济的强劲动力。

;

;;客流明显回升，凸显内需回暖、生产恢复;

;

;从假期出行数据看，全国日发送旅客总量保持在5200万人次高位运行，单日客流量较去年同期增长50%以上。

;

;“恰逢中秋国庆假期叠加，探亲、旅游需求旺盛，全社会人员流动量大幅提升，跨省份长距离出行明显增长。”交通运输部有关负责人说。

;

;高铁站熙熙攘攘。日均发送旅客40.9万人次、加开高铁列车达1340列……广州南站全面提升运能运力。“假期前六天，共发送旅客254.4万人次，比2019年增加17.5%。高峰期间，广州南站采取开行高峰线列车等方式，确保旅客出行顺利。”广铁集团客运部营销科科长谢潮方说。

;

;航站楼人头攒动。音乐欢快，花灯闪烁，北京首都国际机场T3航站楼内，精心布置的节日主题景观吸引了不少旅客驻足留影。“假期前五天，日均旅客量超过16.8万人次，同比翻两番。”首都机场运行控制中心运行高级经理谢悦说，机场迎来出行高峰，国内航空业务稳步增长，航班数超2019年同期水平。

;

;乡村游线路车水马龙。沿着申嘉湖高速公路向东驱车两小时，驶入乡村公路，只见两侧花木掩映、远处群山起伏。“10公里长的农村路，串起茶山、湖泊等多个景点，引来众多游客。”浙江湖州市长兴县和平镇滩龙桥村党支部书记马新农介绍，假期前四天，就有4500多辆自驾车驶往霞幕湖畔，超1.5万名游客前来游玩。

;

;浙江宁波舟山港穿山港区，远洋巨轮往来不停，11个泊位全线运营。杭州亚运会物流中心，7.2万平方米的库区内，数十台无人叉车、多架盘点无人机往来穿梭。

;

;“近半个月来，物流中心每天处理物资超万件，自启用后物流车总里程近6万公里，累计收发物资近20万件，有效保障亚运盛会物资高效调配。”圆通速递亚运项目组负责人辛兆飞表示。

;

;人享其行、物畅其流，凸显内需回暖、生产恢复。

;

;;基建持续升级，路网系统支撑有力;

;

;超大“流量”要靠超强实力。人享其行、物畅其流的背后，是日趋完善的路网体系和更加强大的基建水平。

;

;铁路新线通车，让出行“一日千里”。

;

;“早上从福州出发，1小时左右就能到泉州。”10月2日，福建福州市民蔡韵佳带着家人，从福州南站乘坐G5139次复兴号列车，前往泉州参加“欢度双节·打卡世遗”活动。

;

;9月28日，福厦高铁正式通车运营。福州至厦门最快55分钟可达，两地实现“一小时生活圈”。

;

;这个假期，多条高铁新线迎来“首秀”。9月26日广汕高铁开通运营后，到10月3日累计发送旅客27.6万人次，9月28日开通运营的沪宁沿江高铁累计发送旅客超16万人次。

;

;新航线启动运营，让旅游“说走就走”。

;

;10月3日22时许，CZ3359次航班稳稳降落在新疆喀什徕宁国际机场，这是南航1个多月前新开的航线，也是粤港澳大湾区首条直飞喀什的航线。

;

;飞机刚落地，许多游客便纷纷举起手机拍照。“以前，转机旅程久，如今有了直飞航班，从广州可6小时直达。”广州游客吴先生兴奋地说。据了解，新航线开通以来，南航已保障旅客出行6000余人次，有效助推边疆游。

;

;9月28日，东航新开通上海—伊斯坦布尔直飞往返航线，几乎趟趟满员；9月30日，华夏航空开通重庆—文山—深圳航线，开航当天客座率达到100%……连日来，不少航空公司增添新航线，为旅客假期出行提供新选择。

;

;新高速建成通车，让自驾游更加火热。

;

;观看“村BA”、品尝特色美食、感受红色文化……重庆市民张先生沿着重遵扩容高速公路一路向西，仅开车两小时，便体验了一段沉浸式旅游。9月29日，重遵扩容高速通车运营，使得重庆到遵义的通车时间由3小时缩短到2小时。

;

;运三高速、济潍高速等全线通车；贵南高铁开通、青藏铁路西宁至格尔木段提质改造项目投产运营；平陆运河、黄茅海跨海通道等重大工程持续推进……今日之中国，已建成全球最大的高速铁路网、高速公路网、邮政快递网和世界级港口群，国家综合立体交通网主骨架空间格局基本形成，各种运输方式衔接效率正加快提升。

;

;;统筹调度有序，交通运输服务更优;

;

;及时应对、周全考虑、优化服务……这个假期，各地区各部门多措并举，努力营造更加健康、舒适、安全的出行环境。

;

;——优化运力调配，保障群众出行。

;

;日均计划开行旅客列车1.15万余列，较日常增加1850余列，其中最高峰日安排开行列车超过1.2万列，日均旅客座席能力预计较2019年同期增长18.5%……应对超大客流，全国铁路实行高峰列车运行图，增加运力投放。

;

;为充分挖掘运输潜力，铁路部门“一日一图”精准调配，动态满足短途旅客出行需求。中国铁路哈尔滨局集团有限公司增开119列临客列车，将运力提升到最大。北京南站4个快速进站厅每日常态化开启，并设置急客通道，优化出行体验。

;

;——提速转型升级，提升出行效率。

;

;线上注册认证，“刷脸”即可值机、安检、登机；上线行李智能测量机，5秒钟就能测出行李体积和重量，并自动匹配不同航司、舱位的行李限额要求……从广州白云国际机场出发，一系列智慧机场服务助旅客高效出行。

;

;“目前机场配置的234台自助值机设备、114台自助行李托运设备已全部开放。”白云国际机场股份有限公司信息科技部部长杨洪宇介绍，高峰期每天服务旅客7.7万人次，有效减少了排队等候时间。

;

;——加快运旅融合，增强特色体验。

;

;江苏盐城，淮徐高速高作服务区，往来旅客络绎不绝。“来服务区休息，没想到这里还有恐龙乐园和梦幻城堡。”来自徐州的游客王克说，既像商场又像乐园，不愧是“新晋旅游打卡地”。近年来，江苏交投完成沿线7对服务区转型升级工作，将单一业态转变为多元商业综合体，打造出一批小而美的特色主题服务区。

;

;交通是经济发展的“大动脉”和“先行官”。透过中秋国庆假期这个窗口可以看到，高质量发展的交通运输正为中国式现代化注入新动能。
